name: SAG-AFTRA
sampleDescriptions: Support H.R. 4130 American Music Fairness Act; Support H.R. 2116, CROWN Act; support H.R. 4750, Performing Artist Tax Parity Act.
Support equitable treatment for terrestrial broadcasts and internet services. Support H.R. 4130 - American Music Fairness Act.
Support modifying tax deduction for expenses of performing artists to consider inflation. Support H.R. 4750 - Performing Artist Tax Parity Act.
Support equitable treatment for terrestrial broadcasts and internet services. Support H.R. 4130 - American Music Fairness Act.
